definitions.definition: The inner flight muscle ( pectoralis minor ) of poultry .

secondary_definitions: The inner flight muscle ( pectoralis minor ) of poultry .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) Someone who tends or waits on someone.
( rail transport ) A railroad car towed behind a steam engine to carry fuel and water.
( nautical ) A naval ship that functions as a mobile base for other ships.
( nautical ) A smaller boat used for transportation between a large ship and the shore .
( diving ) A member of a diving team who assists a diver during a dive but does not themselves go underwater .
Ellipsis of water tender ( “ firefighting apparatus ” ) .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) Someone who tends or waits on someone.
secondary_definitions: ( rail transport ) A railroad car towed behind a steam engine to carry fuel and water.
( nautical ) A naval ship that functions as a mobile base for other ships.
( nautical ) A smaller boat used for transportation between a large ship and the shore .
( diving ) A member of a diving team who assists a diver during a dive but does not themselves go underwater .
Ellipsis of water tender ( “ firefighting apparatus ” ) .

definitions.definition: Anything which is offered , proffered , put forth or bid with the expectation of a response , answer , or reply .
examples: You offer me the sword of my father, the very man whose bones, because of your perfidy, lie under the sod of Crecy. Aye, I'll surely take it, and just as surely you shall die with your tender through your heart!

definitions.definition: A means of payment such as a check or cheque , cash or credit card .
examples: Your credit card has been declined so you need to provide some other tender such as cash.

definitions.definition: A formal offer to buy or sell something.
examples: We will submit our tender to you within the week.

definitions.definition: Any offer or proposal made for acceptance.

main_definition: Anything which is offered , proffered , put forth or bid with the expectation of a response , answer , or reply .
secondary_definitions: A means of payment such as a check or cheque , cash or credit card .
( law ) A formal offer to buy or sell something.
Any offer or proposal made for acceptance.
